title: Executive Order 6003-Classification of Miss Paula Gillespie
content: Miss Paula Gillespie, who has been employed in the office of the Assistant Secretary of the Navy, as senior clerk-stenographer, without a competitive classified status since April 22, 1930, is hereby classified.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Assistant Secretary of the Navy.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6003-Classification of Miss Paula Gillespie Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361557
